==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|く|おん|sort=くおん}}

===Etymology===
From ''ku'' or ''kyū'' ([[久]], of [[long]] duration, [[longstanding]], [[lasting]] a long time) + ''on'' or ''en'' ([[遠]], [[distant]] (in time), [[far-off]], [[remote]])

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|くおん}}

{{ja-noun|きゅうえん}}

# [[eternity]]

===Usage notes===
* ''kuon'' is more commonly used than ''kyūen''

===Alternative forms===
* 久遠の (''kuon no''): of or relating to eternity, [[eternal]]
